__e: I can never go back to loving you the way I did knowing that my love wasn't strong enough the first time around.
I don't think I could ever love you as you would wish, and it would be wrong for us to marry if I didn't love you in that way.
Of the fact that Greg might not love you as he said he has.
I know I love you, and I want to spend the rest of my life with you.

Sure, it was a mistake not thinking about the future, but that doesn't mean that it was a mistake being with you or loving you, and... and I married you because I wanted to spend the rest of your life with you, and I still do.
And it isn't his fault he cannot love you... any more than it's mine that I adore you.
I didn't think it was possible to love you more than I do right now.
Maybe not by blood, but he couldn't love you any more if he were.
But if she was able to love you for who you are, so can I.
Once She Sees Who You Are- Who You Are- She'll Be Able To Love You For What You Are.
I love everything about you, and I want to love you for the rest of my life.
